pageContext.claim: “The Fake News Media is going Crazy! They are suffering a major “breakdown,” have ZERO credibility or respect, & must be thinking about going legit. I have learned to live with Fake News, which has never been more corrupt than it is right now. Someday, I will tell you the secret!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump frequently labels as "fake news" legitimate news organizations that run critical or skeptical articles about him or his administration. Such organizations try hard to get the facts right and quickly correct mistakes when they occur.
